titleStmt.title: A narrative of the imprisonment and tryal of Mr. David Lewis, priest of the Society of Jesus at the assizes held at Monmouth, March 28, 1679, to which is annexed his last speech at the place of execution, August 27, 1679 / written by himself.
titleStmt.author: Lewis, David, Saint, 1617-1679.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: "Mr. Johnson's [i.e. John Wall's] speech which he deliver'd to his friend to be printed (as he mention'd at the place of execution)": 8 p. at end, is lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress and Huntington Library.
With: The last speech of Mr. David Lewis. [London : s.n., 1679].
